Growing Up NYC
  • Patterns

Navigation

The navigation object can be used to define the paths to different parts of the user's application. The user also has an option to append an off-canvas navigation which will toggle open from right to left to display additional information. Click here for a demo page.

Resources by Age

  1. Baby

    1. 2 months
    1. 4 months
    1. 6 months
    1. 9 months
Growing Up NYC
  • Programs
  • Events
  • Ages
<div class="o-offcanvas js-offcanvas" id="offcanvas-ages">
  <nav aria-label="ages-heading" class="o-offcanvas__side js-offcanvas__side"
    id="ages" role="navigation">
    <h2 class="show-for-screen-reader" id="ages-heading">Resources by Age</h2>
    <button class="o-offcanvas__close button--text"
      data-js="offcanvas-ages"><svg class="icon--small" role="img">
        <title>Close Resources by Age</title>
        <use xlink:href="#icon-close"></use>
      </svg></button>
    <ol class="js-accordion c-list-box c-list-box--secondary"
      data-multiselectable="true">
      <li class="c-list-box__item">
        <h3 class="js-accordion__header c-list-box__heading" id="baby-heading"
          tabindex="0">Baby</h3>
        <ol class="js-accordion__content c-list-box__content">
          <li><a class="c-list-box__subitem" href="#">2 months</a></li>
        </ol>
        <ol class="js-accordion__content c-list-box__content">
          <li><a class="c-list-box__subitem" href="#">4 months</a></li>
        </ol>
        <ol class="js-accordion__content c-list-box__content">
          <li><a class="c-list-box__subitem" href="#">6 months</a></li>
        </ol>
        <ol class="js-accordion__content c-list-box__content">
          <li><a class="c-list-box__subitem" href="#">9 months</a></li>
        </ol>
      </li>
    </ol>
  </nav>
  <div class="o-offcanvas__main mt-20 mb-40">
    <header class="o-navigation">
      <div class="o-container"><a
          class="o-navigation__logo-wrapper o-navigation__logo-wrapper-no-menu"
          href="#"><span class="o-navigation__logo">Growing Up NYC</span></a>
        <nav class="o-navigation__nav">
          <ul class="o-inline">
            <li class="o-inline__item"><a class="o-navigation__nav-link"
                href="#">Programs</a></li>
            <li class="o-inline__item"><a class="o-navigation__nav-link"
                href="#">Events</a></li>
            <li class="o-inline__item"><a
                class="o-navigation__nav-link js-offcanvas"
                data-js="offcanvas-patterns" href="#ages">Ages</a></li>
            <li class="o-inline__item"><a class="o-navigation__nav-link"
                href="#search"><svg
                  class="o-navigation__icon o-navigation__icon__search"
                  role="img">
                  <title>Search</title>
                  <use xlink:href="#icon-search"></use>
                </svg></a></li>
          </ul>
        </nav>
      </div>
    </header>
  </div><a aria-hidden="true" class="o-offcanvas__overlay"
    data-js="offcanvas-ages"></a>
</div>
